title: Improvement request: More efficient disk sorting logic for border values in row data processing
description: The current disk sorting logic for row values with border values is not efficient. It would be better to improve the logic to handle border values more efficiently.
EB: Currently, the disk sorting logic for row values with border values is not efficient. It is expected that a more efficient logic will be implemented. One possible improvement is to sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
SR:
1. Copy the file to the destination folder.
2. Implement a more efficient disk sorting logic to handle row values with border values.
3. Sort the data directly in memory.
4. Write the sorted data to the file.
